category.name: ProductView
category.category_description: Preferences affecting the behavior of Product views

preference.name: Vis_PV_capture3DGeomAssetAsOutline
preference.preference_description: Activates the creation of outline capture during Product view save in the Lifecycle Visualization application. This is only used if 3D Geometry Asset Capture is enabled for Product View save with no menus. Starting with Teamcenter 10.0 this preference is no longer used but remains in order to maintain backwards compatibility with Teamcenter Visualization 9 releases. Valid values are true or false (default value).
